page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN THORNTON
page.content:
MY DAD {MR.D.APPLEBY,}WORKS AS A MAINTENANCE SUPERVISOR AT THE ICI VICTREX PLANT AT THORNTON.HE HAS WORKED THERE FOR 19 YEARS.THE FACTORY PRODUCES PLASTICS WHICH ARE SOLD ALL OVER THE WORLD.ALTHOUGH THE CHEMICAL PROCESS IS AN INDUSTRIAL SECRET,THE INDUSTRY IS BASED ON A HUGE ROCK -SALT DEPOSIT AT NEAR BY PREESALL.THIS ROCK -SALT DEPOSIT WAS FOUND ABOUT A 100 YEARS AGO WHEN SOME MEN WERE DRILLING FOR IRON ORE.THEY FOUND THE SALT INSTEAD.TODAY IT IS USED AT THE BASIS OF A VERY IMPORTANT PLASTIC INDUSTRY.
I WONDER IF YOU,THE READER,STILL USE PLASTICS? {BY JOANNE E.APPLEBY.}
